places.name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel
places.description: Contemporary lodging with a restaurant for casual dining, plus free WiFi & an airport shuttle.

owner.name: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel (Owner)

places.address: Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport- Richmond, an IHG Hotel, 10720 Cambie Rd., Richmond, BC V6X 1K8

featured_reviews.review_id: I had a pleasant surprise during my stay at the Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport in Richmond. I had initially avoided it due to its seemingly hidden location in a car dealership parking lot, but I was genuinely impressed. The gym was excellent, my room was impeccably clean, and the staff went above and beyond in providing friendly service. The attached restaurant offered great food and top-notch service, making my stay truly enjoyable. A hidden gem indeed!
featured_reviews.review_text: I had a pleasant surprise during my stay at the Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport in Richmond. I had initially avoided it due to its seemingly hidden location in a car dealership parking lot, but I was genuinely impressed. The gym was excellent, my room was impeccably clean, and the staff went above and beyond in providing friendly service. The attached restaurant offered great food and top-notch service, making my stay truly enjoyable. A hidden gem indeed!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Steven, 

Good Day!


Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience at the Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport in Richmond. We truly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear about your pleasant surprise during your stay.

We understand that our location within a car dealership parking lot may be unconventional, but we're delighted that you found the experience to be a hidden gem. We take pride in offering exceptional amenities and services to our guests.

It's fantastic to hear that you enjoyed our excellent gym facilities, impeccably clean rooms, and the friendly service provided by our dedicated staff. We're also pleased that you had a great dining experience at our attached restaurant. We strive to provide top-notch service in every aspect of your stay, and your feedback reaffirms our commitment to delivering a memorable experience to all our guests.

We look forward to welcoming you back to the Holiday Inn Vancouver Airport in Richmond in the future. If there's anything specific you'd like during your next stay, please don't hesitate to let us know. Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we appreciate your support.

Kevin Ortiz Luis
Front Office Staff

featured_reviews.review_id: This hotel was a great experience. Jasmine at the front desk was the most friendly and helpful employee that I have ever had the pleasure of meeting at any Holiday Inn hotel. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Though they didn't offer a free breakfast, the attached restaurant was very good. We used it for both breakfast and dinner and were very satisfied. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.
featured_reviews.review_text: This hotel was a great experience. Jasmine at the front desk was the most friendly and helpful employee that I have ever had the pleasure of meeting at any Holiday Inn hotel. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Though they didn't offer a free breakfast, the attached restaurant was very good. We used it for both breakfast and dinner and were very satisfied. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone.

featured_reviews.review_id: I travel almost every week so I've stayed at a number of hotels and was even scheduled to stay at a different major hotel chain during these dates. However, I had a nightmare of an experience at that other hotel and rebooked last minute at this hotel and I'm so glad I did. The staff were so welcoming and friendly on my arrival. The room was clean and well maintained. Staff were quick to respond to minor requests I had like an extra blanket or silverware. And they let food delivery services deliver right to my room making it so much easier for me to decompress after a long day at work. I would happily stay here again!
featured_reviews.review_text: I travel almost every week so I've stayed at a number of hotels and was even scheduled to stay at a different major hotel chain during these dates. However, I had a nightmare of an experience at that other hotel and rebooked last minute at this hotel and I'm so glad I did. The staff were so welcoming and friendly on my arrival. The room was clean and well maintained. Staff were quick to respond to minor requests I had like an extra blanket or silverware. And they let food delivery services deliver right to my room making it so much easier for me to decompress after a long day at work. I would happily stay here again!

featured_reviews.review_id: Stayed here a few weeks ago via a last minute reservation when my stay at another nearby hotel went south. This property was just what I needed to help turnaround my day. The staff were friendly, welcomed me with a smile, and even proactively helped me with unloading and storing my bags. Parking a bit odd in terms of layout and design but very manageable once you understand how it works. Staff were quickly responsive to requests I made and food delivery was allowed to deliver the food directly to my room. This hotel is a gem that is of the best Holiday Inns I've stayed at in a long time. I would be delighted to stay here again next time I'm in the area and need a hotel near the airport.
featured_reviews.review_text: Stayed here a few weeks ago via a last minute reservation when my stay at another nearby hotel went south. This property was just what I needed to help turnaround my day. The staff were friendly, welcomed me with a smile, and even proactively helped me with unloading and storing my bags. Parking a bit odd in terms of layout and design but very manageable once you understand how it works. Staff were quickly responsive to requests I made and food delivery was allowed to deliver the food directly to my room. This hotel is a gem that is of the best Holiday Inns I've stayed at in a long time. I would be delighted to stay here again next time I'm in the area and need a hotel near the airport.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Lucas Matze, 

Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Holiday Inn VANCOUVER AIRPORT- RICHMOND.

Please know that your feedback is extremely valuable to us. We use feedback, such as yours, to continuously make changes to our brand to improve the guest experience. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Again, thank you for choosing Holiday Inn, and if I can be of assistance to you, please contact me directly at 6048211818 or service@hiyvr.com.

Sincerely,
Kendrick Padua
Front Office Manager
6048211818
service@hiyvr.com

featured_reviews.review_id: The staff at this location are so very friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and modern. The facility offers everything you need if you are overnighting to/from a flight or a cruise. It is also a good location to access the city for longer stays. I use the hotel regularly and have yet to have a bad experience. I would recommend it. The only "negative" and it is not the hotel, is the attached restaurants breakfast is quite expensive and the quality is not the best and the service can be slow at times. But that's not the hotel!
featured_reviews.review_text: The staff at this location are so very friendly and helpful. The rooms are clean and modern. The facility offers everything you need if you are overnighting to/from a flight or a cruise. It is also a good location to access the city for longer stays. I use the hotel regularly and have yet to have a bad experience. I would recommend it. The only "negative" and it is not the hotel, is the attached restaurants breakfast is quite expensive and the quality is not the best and the service can be slow at times. But that's not the hotel!

featured_reviews.review_id: Positive: This came up as a 3.5 star hotel,so I was expecting a 'run-of-the-mill' type of stay. The staff (Kendrick) was extremely helpful and courteous, even taking the time to map out some attractions and restaurants. Room was spacious and overall pretty clean. Negative: Location was ok.  No real attractions or food other than the restaurant attached.
featured_reviews.review_text: Positive: This came up as a 3.5 star hotel,so I was expecting a 'run-of-the-mill' type of stay. The staff (Kendrick) was extremely helpful and courteous, even taking the time to map out some attractions and restaurants. Room was spacious and overall pretty clean. Negative: Location was ok.  No real attractions or food other than the restaurant attached.

featured_reviews.review_id:
My family and I had a great experience here!
From the booking phone call to the check out everything was organized and easy.
The rooms were modern and ergonomic. Classy and convenient.
The staff was thoughtful and kind.
I highly recommend this hotel.
featured_reviews.review_text:
My family and I had a great experience here!
From the booking phone call to the check out everything was organized and easy.
The rooms were modern and ergonomic. Classy and convenient.
The staff was thoughtful and kind.
I highly recommend this hotel.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Dear Harry! 

Your feedback truly brightened our day! We're absolutely thrilled that you and your family had such an enjoyable time with us. Your appreciation for our modern and ergonomic rooms, smooth booking process, and our team's thoughtful service means the world to us.

We can't thank you enough for the recommendation, and we're already looking forward to the pleasure of hosting you again in the future. If there's anything else you'd like to share or if there are any special requests for your next visit, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Warmest regards,
Kendrick P. 
Front Office Manager

featured_reviews.review_id: Our flight had been cancelled unexpectedly and we picked up the "black phone" and were able to make a booking for this location right away. We didn't wait long and took the shuttle. The shuttle to and from the airport was free. Staff were amazing at understanding our circumstances and making us feel at home. It's a few mins from the airport and the rooms are spacious and clean. They even mailed my son's earphones that he had left behind to us! Thank you for your great service.
featured_reviews.review_text: Our flight had been cancelled unexpectedly and we picked up the "black phone" and were able to make a booking for this location right away. We didn't wait long and took the shuttle. The shuttle to and from the airport was free. Staff were amazing at understanding our circumstances and making us feel at home. It's a few mins from the airport and the rooms are spacious and clean. They even mailed my son's earphones that he had left behind to us! Thank you for your great service.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Good Day! 

Thank you for your feedback. We are happy to hear that your stay with us was nothing but wonderful.

We look forward to seeing you again in your next visit to Vancouver. 

Thank you! 
Ken P.

places.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Riverport Richmond, an IHG Hotel
places.description: Contemporary lodging with an indoor pool & an exercise room, plus a free breakfast bar & WiFi.

owner.name: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Riverport Richmond, an IHG Hotel (Owner)

places.address: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Riverport Richmond, an IHG Hotel, 10688 No 6 Rd, Richmond, BC V6W 1E7

featured_reviews.review_id: Excellent as always. Far enough from the airport to be quiet and yet still have walkable and short drive distances to dinner meals. Excellent corporate style breakfast buffet. Eggs, couple of meats, couple of non-meats all hot. Rotates through a few choices during the week. Good pool and hot tub indoors. Parking included.
featured_reviews.review_text: Excellent as always. Far enough from the airport to be quiet and yet still have walkable and short drive distances to dinner meals. Excellent corporate style breakfast buffet. Eggs, couple of meats, couple of non-meats all hot. Rotates through a few choices during the week. Good pool and hot tub indoors. Parking included.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Martin Ridgway 

We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your positive experience with us! It brings us immense joy to hear that you found your stay excellent and enjoyed the various amenities we offer.

We're delighted to know that our location provided the perfect balance--quiet enough to ensure a peaceful stay, yet conveniently close to walkable and short drive distances for dining options. Your feedback on our corporate-style breakfast buffet is especially gratifying; we're thrilled to hear that the selection of eggs, meats, non-meats, and the rotating choices throughout the week met your expectations.

It's wonderful to learn that you had a relaxing time at our indoor pool and hot tub. We strive to create an environment where our guests can unwind and make the most of their stay.

We're also pleased that our complimentary parking added to the convenience of your visit. Providing hassle-free services is a priority for us, and we're delighted to have exceeded your expectations.

Thank you again for choosing [Hotel Name], and we look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay. If you have any specific preferences for your next visit or if there's anything else we can assist you with, please don't hesitate to let us know.

Safe travels, and we can't wait to host you again!

featured_reviews.review_id: We always go back to this place. Close to the ice hockey arena, swimming, cinema, bowling lane and dining. They serve free breakfast at this location. Dining is always a pleasure. Well run kitchen.  Kitchen crew amazing! Very friendly and attentive to the clients needs especially Elbora and Josefina!
featured_reviews.review_text: We always go back to this place. Close to the ice hockey arena, swimming, cinema, bowling lane and dining. They serve free breakfast at this location. Dining is always a pleasure. Well run kitchen.  Kitchen crew amazing! Very friendly and attentive to the clients needs especially Elbora and Josefina!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Anne Marcelo 

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your positive experiences with us! We're thrilled to hear that you always choose to return to our establishment and that our location near the ice hockey arena, swimming facilities, cinema, and bowling lane adds to the convenience of your visits.

It's wonderful to know that you find dining at our location to be a pleasure. We take great pride in our well-run kitchen and are delighted that you've highlighted the amazing efforts of our kitchen crew. Elnora and Josefina will be especially pleased to hear that their dedication to providing excellent service has been recognized. We'll make sure to pass along your compliments to them.

We appreciate your kind words about our free breakfast service and are pleased to hear that our team is attentive to your needs. Creating a positive and memorable experience for our clients is our top priority, and feedback like yours motivates us to continue delivering exceptional service.

We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit, and please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything specific you'd like us to enhance or if you have any special requests.

Thank you again for your continued patronage and for choosing to stay with us!

featured_reviews.review_id: Thank you for a truly fantastic hotel experience! My room was clean, fresh, and had a wonderful view of the fall trees. I truly appreciated the amenities including the mini fridge, microwave, large variety of breakfast options, pool, and gym. Each day that I was staying with you, I kept thinking about how pleased I was with this experience. I have already recommended your location to several others.
featured_reviews.review_text: Thank you for a truly fantastic hotel experience! My room was clean, fresh, and had a wonderful view of the fall trees. I truly appreciated the amenities including the mini fridge, microwave, large variety of breakfast options, pool, and gym. Each day that I was staying with you, I kept thinking about how pleased I was with this experience. I have already recommended your location to several others.

featured_reviews.review_id: The staff was super friendly and helpful, the location had so many things to do with the family all within walking distance. The rooms were clean, comfy and quiet. The breakfast was good with many choices but was busy, there was an over flow room for it that was also busy but it worked. The pool was on the cool side but the kids still enjoyed it and I have never seen a hotel with its own little basketball court too! Will stay here again!
featured_reviews.review_text: The staff was super friendly and helpful, the location had so many things to do with the family all within walking distance. The rooms were clean, comfy and quiet. The breakfast was good with many choices but was busy, there was an over flow room for it that was also busy but it worked. The pool was on the cool side but the kids still enjoyed it and I have never seen a hotel with its own little basketball court too! Will stay here again!

featured_reviews.review_id:
It's alright.

Everyone keeps mentioning the excellent breakfast. However, every morning the breakfast room is insane, it's so busy. They need a bit better layout for it. You will almost get run over constantly when going to breakfast

Also only two of the five days I was there did they have scrambled eggs and bacon, the scrambled eggs are very good. However on days without scrambled eggs they have a "cheese egg omelet". That thing sucks. It's dry, heavy and flavorless. They need to stop even making that thing

Most mornings they also have "breakfast potatoes" (small potato cubes) they are bland and uninspired, and not fully cooked. One day of my stay they had actual hash browns (the fast food type like at McDonalds).  Those were really, really good. Stick with proper hash browns, holiday inn! The "breakfast potatoes" are horrible!

They usually have some type of sausage-  however, only on one day did they have sausage patties (they always had turkey sausage links, every day). With a sausage patty I was able to make a sandwich with a English muffin. But all other days they only had links, one day they had a pork link and turkey links, so now you couldn't really make a breakfast sandwich. Serving sausage patties gives more options for breakfast and they only did it one day of my stay.

Like other reviewers mentioned, I also experienced problems with my keycard not working , it decided to stop working entirely. They did get it fixed promptly so that was appreciated, but it took me running down the elevator twice and then into the general manager in the hallway to get it fully resolved

The bed is pretty hard. My bed at home isn't super soft but be aware this bed is hard, your shoulders and hips WILL hurt the first day or so.

The window blinds are awesome, they are easy to move, and block not only light but sound very effectively.

The room was fine, I had the King Studio which had a small mini kitchen (hot plate, coffee maker, toaster oven, microwave, utensils)

Bathrooms have a vent in the ceiling but no bathroom fan. This seems to be a trend in hotels lately I don't know why

Location is pretty good it is pretty quiet at night and near the freeway to exit as well as just a mile of two from a large shopping plaza that had coffee shops and a grocery and drug store

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Bradley 

Thank you for your review. Breakfast is set by IHG brand standards and we always try and switch things around for those guests who are here long term. I am so sorry that some offferings were not favorable for you and we wish that we could offer a lot of different items. However we need to stick to the brand standard issued by IHG 

We hope that this will not be a deterrent from staying with us in the future. Please reach out when you are ready to make your next reservation.

featured_reviews.review_id: We had an awesome stay!  Kudos to the staff here for excellent customer service.  The property is clean and well-maintained.  The bed and pillows are fantastic - my family slept so well! The pool and hot tub were great for the kids.  Breakfast was good and had options for the kids.  The location is in good proximity to the airport.
featured_reviews.review_text: We had an awesome stay!  Kudos to the staff here for excellent customer service.  The property is clean and well-maintained.  The bed and pillows are fantastic - my family slept so well! The pool and hot tub were great for the kids.  Breakfast was good and had options for the kids.  The location is in good proximity to the airport.

featured_reviews.review_id:
We stayed at the Riverboat Richmond overnight prior to our cruise. This hotel was (relatively speaking!) more reasonably priced than many Vancouver hotels. It was closer to the airport than the pier which was fine since we were arriving around midnight after traveling for most of the day and just wanted to check in and get some sleep. 



Calling for the shuttle was easy. The phone was answered right away. Since the shuttle would take about an hour to get to the airport (it was on another call) we were told to grab a cab and the hotel would reimburse us. This worked fine-although they reimbursed us in Canadian dollars rather than giving us a credit on our credit card. Travel time to hotel was short. 



The room was clean and comfortable. It had a kitchenette which was nice if we had been staying longer. Breakfast was good and had a variety of options. Area around hotel seemed safe. 



We used Uber the next day to travel to pier. For 4 of us (and lots of luggage!) it cost about $40-50.
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id: This is a nice clean holiday inn.   It's an express so it's very basic.  Perfect for a one-day stop.   It is near some services and the roads.  The service here is friendly and efficient.   The room was comfortable and clean.  It checks all of the boxes.   It is not real close to the airport however.  So if you arrive around rush hour or need to get to the airport quickly, it may take a while.  Also I learned too late that you need to call their shuttle.  There are several holiday inns in the area and that can get a little confusing.  If you need a clean and comfortable airport hotel this is a good option.  We'd return.
featured_reviews.review_text: This is a nice clean holiday inn.   It's an express so it's very basic.  Perfect for a one-day stop.   It is near some services and the roads.  The service here is friendly and efficient.   The room was comfortable and clean.  It checks all of the boxes.   It is not real close to the airport however.  So if you arrive around rush hour or need to get to the airport quickly, it may take a while.  Also I learned too late that you need to call their shuttle.  There are several holiday inns in the area and that can get a little confusing.  If you need a clean and comfortable airport hotel this is a good option.  We'd return.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Thank you for sharing your thoughts on your recent stay at our Holiday Inn Express. We truly appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear that you found our hotel to be a nice and clean option for your one-day stop.

We're glad you found our location convenient and appreciated the friendly and efficient service provided by our team. It's wonderful to know that you found your room comfortable and clean - creating a comfortable and welcoming atmosphere for our guests is a top priority for us.

We apologize for any inconvenience regarding the distance from the airport and the shuttle service. We'll make sure to communicate the shuttle process more clearly in the future to avoid any confusion.

Thank you for considering us a good option for a clean and comfortable stay near the airport. We would be absolutely thrilled to welcome you back whenever your travels bring you to the area again. If you ever need anything or have any further questions, please feel free to reach out to us.

Safe travels and looking forward to your return!

Farah Dawood 
General Manager

places.name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond
places.description: Modern lodging with an exercise room, plus a free airport shuttle, breakfast bar & WiFi.

owner.name: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond (Owner)

places.address: Holiday Inn Express Vancouver Airport - Richmond, 9351 Bridgeport Rd, Richmond, BC V6X 1S3

featured_reviews.review_id: Great experience, from the time that I took the complimentary shadow from the Airport to The hotel Holiday Inn Express Richmond, the driver Dean, Dean, he was very nice and courteous,  he gave me a lot of information of how to get around the hotel, restaurants and places to visit,  The staff at Front Desk where nice and professional. The rooms are nice clean and comfortable, Breakfast was good and enough to get you started and ready for your day. I stayed here 2 weekend's in a row total of 4 nights. The housekeeper Li (both w-ends) was very nice and friendly. The hotel is well located, conveniently close to the airport (24/7 complimentary shuttle or if you are driving secure parking is available) close to the Bridgeport Station (about 10 minutes walk) where you can take the TransLink Metro, Vancouver's transportation network, it will allow you to go anywhere, either by train or bus. Next door to the hotel there is Costco, and a few restaurants that are walking distance.

Next door to the hotel there is Costco, and a few restaurants that are walking distance.

Hello Tani Jesus Garcia,

We appreciate you providing a detailed overview of your recent stay with us. We are delighted to hear you have enjoyed your accommodation, please think of us again the next time you are visiting the area. 

Regards
Eric Li
Guest Services Manager

featured_reviews.review_id:
Top notch people as staff here, friendly even helped me when my hands were full by setting my floor level in elevator.  Loved how they went above and beyond then respected our space when napping. Great location, buttery soft beds, pillows and bedding. Great products in the room for our comfort. Continental breakfast was actually cooked in kitchen, meals, food prep and serving set up was all immaculate.
Best hotel stay yet.
featured_reviews.review_text:

Thank you so much for your kind words. We are thrilled to hear that your stay with us was your best hotel experience yet. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay. 

Regards
Eric Li
GSM

featured_reviews.review_id: Positive: The front desk staff were helpful and friendly- we felt very welcome there. It was wonderful to have a hot breakfast included with a good variety of options considering the small dining area. The room was clean and with modernized design. Great place! Negative: The elevator & general lobby area are very small so it can be cramped with a lot of people around but nothing that would ruin the experience.
featured_reviews.review_text: Positive: The front desk staff were helpful and friendly- we felt very welcome there. It was wonderful to have a hot breakfast included with a good variety of options considering the small dining area. The room was clean and with modernized design. Great place! Negative: The elevator & general lobby area are very small so it can be cramped with a lot of people around but nothing that would ruin the experience.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Housekeeping Rocks!

The beds and pillows so comfortable, the shower great water pressure. The workout room so clean, with three treadmills 
 even a washroom, scale, and a rowing machine, (Which I was too tired to try but next time.) I usually don't even bother wiping down after using gym in other hotels because they are so filthy, this one I did as I respect the housekeeping. I didn't have any cash when I checked out to leave the housekeeping but I saw they had a ATM in the lobby, so before my shuttle left I asked if I could go back up to the room so they gave me another key and I rushed up and gave 20.00 (they deserve more but not a rich person) to the housekeeper cleaning my room...they deserve it as I feel they are the ones who can keep a hotel successful!
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id: The staff was really nice and helpful and the rooms definitely seemed new and updated (though, to be honest, a little dark. they could have used a little more light as it was hard to see into my luggage - i had to use my phone flashlight) but good lord was it loud!! I should have realized it was a bad sign when the hotel room provided a sound machine for "restful sleep". All the rooms face the Costco, which unloads trucks all night long. Because of that noise I probably would not return here, which is a shame because it was very convenient to the airport.
featured_reviews.review_text: The staff was really nice and helpful and the rooms definitely seemed new and updated (though, to be honest, a little dark. they could have used a little more light as it was hard to see into my luggage - i had to use my phone flashlight) but good lord was it loud!! I should have realized it was a bad sign when the hotel room provided a sound machine for "restful sleep". All the rooms face the Costco, which unloads trucks all night long. Because of that noise I probably would not return here, which is a shame because it was very convenient to the airport.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Hello Janet C,

We appreciate you taking the time to provide feedback on your recent stay. Thank you again for selecting our hotel. 

Regards
Eric Li
GSM

featured_reviews.review_id: Positive: We arrived at the hotel early, and the front desk clerk let us check into a room within 15 minutes. She directed us to a good nearby restaurant. Later I called down to ask for a shower chair, and one was brought up immediately. Service was excellent!
featured_reviews.review_text: Positive: We arrived at the hotel early, and the front desk clerk let us check into a room within 15 minutes. She directed us to a good nearby restaurant. Later I called down to ask for a shower chair, and one was brought up immediately. Service was excellent!

featured_reviews.review_id: Happy with the hotel, and location with a few restaurants beside the hotel. I was glad to get an early check in and out due to flight timings.  Efficient shuttle bus service to airport round trip. Light breakfast was good with a few meat items,and bakery.

Regards
Eric Li
Guest Services Manager

featured_reviews.review_id: Positive: The staff was very accommodating and allowed us to have a late check-out at no extra charge. The room was pleasant, the included breakfast was good and the shuttle service to the airport was great. We also appreciated the hotel having a luggage scale. Negative: The bathtub in the bathroom had paint peeling off from the inside of it.
